atk-abh03a57:2_1: Vitakkattike yathākammūpagañāṇassa parikammanti dibbacakkhuparikammameva tassa uppādanatthāya parikammaṁ.
atk-abh03a57:2_2: Uppannassa pana vaḷañjanakāle parikammaṁ sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a57:3_0: 82. Ti tadārammaṇabhavaṅgamūlabhavaṅgānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ. Sesamettha sabbaṁ pāḷivaseneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a57:4_0: Dassanattike dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjatītiādīsu dassanena pahātabbo puthujjanassa uppajjati.
atk-abh03a57:4_1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo sotāpannassāpīti evaṁ uparimassa uparimassa heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā nuppajjantīti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a57:4_2: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ekenapi paccayena paccayo na hoti.
atk-abh03a57:4_3: Sesamettha pāḷiṁ anugantvā kusalattike vuttalakkhaṇavaseneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a57:5_0: Dassanenapahātabbahetukattike dassanenapahātabbahetukādīnaṁ vibhāgo aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh03a57:5_2: Evamettha yesaṁ dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbo hetu atthi,
atk-abh03a57:5_4: Yesaṁ so natthi te nevadassanena nabhāvanāyapahātabbahetukāti imaṁ pahātabbahetukavibhāgaṁ ñatvā sesaṁ
atk-abh03a57:5_5: dassanenapahātabbattike ceva kusalattike ca dassitalakkhaṇānusāreneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a57:6_1: Sesaṁ vissajjanato gaṇanato ca yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti.
atk-abh03a57:7_0: Sekkhattike asekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa na kenaci paccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a57:8_2: Vipākānaṁ parittārammaṇānanti paṭisandhiyaṁ kammaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā,
atk-abh03a57:8_4: tadārammaṇavasena javanena gahitaparittārammaṇañca ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppannānaṁ.
atk-abh03a57:9_1: sammattaniyato vā micchattaniyatassa kenaci paccayena paccayo na hoti.
atk-abh03a57:9_2: Micchattaniyato vā sammattaniyato vā sahajātādhipatirahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a57:9_5: Aniyataṁ cittaṁ ārabbha niyatā micchādiṭṭhi uppajjeyya.
atk-abh03a57:9_7: micchattaniyataṁ garuṁ katvā na koci dhammo uppajjati.
atk-abh03a57:10_1: Kammapaccayepi imasmiṁ tike nānākkhaṇikaṁ na labbhati,
atk-abh03a57:11_0: Uppannattike ca atītattike ca paṭiccavārādayo natthi,
atk-abh03a57:11_4: Uppannattike cettha anantarabhāgiyāpi paccayā na labbhanti. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a57:11_6: Uppanno ca anuppanno cāti ime cettha dve dhammā uppannassa ca anuppannassa cāti imesaṁ dvinnaṁ na kenaci paccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a57:11_7: Anuppanno ca uppādī cāti ime pana dve uppannassa ārammaṇūpanissayavasena dvīhi paccayehi paccayo.
atk-abh03a57:12_1: atītānāgatañca atītānāgatassa na kenaci paccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a57:12_2: Nibbānaṁ pana dvīsupi imesu tikesu neva paccayato na paccayuppannato labbhati.
atk-abh03a57:13_1: Ajjhattabahiddhāsaṅkhātā hi ubho rāsayo neva ekato paccayā honti,
atk-abh03a57:13_3: tasmā hatthatale ṭhapitassa sāsapassa vaṇṇopi hatthatalavaṇṇena saddhiṁ ekato ārammaṇaṁ na hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a57:14_1: Gaṇanāpettha pāḷiyaṁ āgatavāre saṅkhipitvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṁsandanesu saṁsanditvā veditabbāti.
